title: post ur main's core item, see if ppl can guess ur main right!

replies.body:
Warrior's enchantment
Ravenous Hydra
Statik Shiv
Boots of mobility

{{item:3116}}  {{item:3111}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3065}}{{item:3083}}  and my last item varies {{item:3146}} , {{item:3075}} ,{{item:3071}}, or {{item:3001}} .

There ain't one way to build it just right.
As a Rumble main... I am thoroughly offended...
Yeah, Mordekaiser is the right answer.
why the fuck do u get a black cleaver on morde

Black cleaver = 300 health, which is equal to a 80 or so increase of the shield.
55 attack damage, that is like 200 extra damage on the last Q
20% cooldown reduction, spamming spells all day
and the cleavage, that's just a bonus for when I fight a tank.

don't get a {{item:3071}}. The passive is almost completely useless on him. Instead, get a {{item:3078}} or a {{item:3115}}  as a replacement. With {{item:3078}} you benefit off of everything it gives you besides mana. {{item:3115}} doesn't give you health but it gives you a huge boost in dps.

Just a suggestion though, i recommend getting your damage items ({{item:3116}} + {{item:3146}}) earlier than your tank items since you don't really have to worry about getting insta-shredded by the whole enemy team early on.

And about your choice of tank items. 
Morde already has sustain with his W and {{item:3146}} so it's not the best idea to get a {{item:3083}}. Get a {{item:3053}} or literally any HP+resistance tank item.
{{item:3742}}'s movement speed passive I think benefits morde more than {{item:3068}}, since morde's main problem is actually getting to the enemies, not fighting them.

don't demonize me though, just trying to give some suggestions. Just try out what I'm saying for a few games, I'm sure you'll find success with it.
Do those stack? I could have sworn they couldn't before .__.
Rod of Ages' passive is not unique. Each stacks individually.
They do, but Seraphs embrace doesn't
Oh, you had me thinking it had to do with hooks from that ''but close'' comment lol

{{item:3071}}  originally, {{item:3022}} as of late for first item. 

Final build looks like {{item:3071}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3111}}
That's easy. Every AD top laner.
{{item:3075}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3075}} {{item:2043}}  Bet you can't guess who it is!

{{item:3512}}{{item:3009}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3151}} 

This is an easy one lol

{{item:3078}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3142}}
Build varies, depends on enemy team comp.

Yes it is Fiora
Is urs {{champion:122}} ?

Yay~!

Nah, it's not Fiora.
To be fair, the build's fairly ambiguous/common in general, which might make it hard to guess.
Well we know yours is a tank/fighter with mana so my guess is {{champion:420}}
